scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 2 CDs, 1 Program and biographical note, 1 submission information note. Notes: There is no paper score included, only recordings. Two versions of the piece are included on two different CDs. One version is labeled "The Chase" the other "The Chase (Quicktime)." Note on envelope CY1.1 .06. .
